projectList.title: SchottkyLink
projectList.description: An interactive visualization system on a family of Kleinian groups based on Schottky groups.

projectList.title: Sphairahedron
projectList.description: Sphairahedra are analogous to polyhedra but with spherical faces. They are invented to introduced a new kind of fractal shape.

projectList.title: JosKleinExperiment
projectList.description: An efficient algorithm to render Kleinian groups with maskit parametrization invented by Jos Leys. This is an experimental renderer for the algorithm.

projectList.title: Shaders on Shadertoy
projectList.description: My Shadertoy page. The main theme of the shaders are mathematical visualization

projectList.title: HyperbolicTessellator
projectList.description: Visualize hyperbolic tessellation and its deformation.

projectList.title: Hyperbolic Being
projectList.description: Audio visual performance software about Hyperbolic Tessellation and Kleinian groups. This software is developed for BSOD 3.0, experimental event for visual performance.
